entry.title: ONDC-Official/verification-logs
entry.summary:
ONDC Pre-production issue & discussion board

Verification Logs

To submit logs for protocol compliance verification, following steps need to be followed:

  1. Create a fork of the "verification-logs" repository
  1. Create a branch with the name of your entity under "logs"
  1. Merge your logs into this branch (logs should include request & response payloads for all enabled APIs)
  1. Create PR for your branch
